subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Rare is the Olympian who can draw famous N.B.A. stars out from under their iPods and turn them into the world’s tallest cheerleaders, as Michael Phelps did on Wednesday.
snippet: Rare is the Olympian who can draw famous N.B.A. stars out from under their iPods and turn them into the world’s tallest cheerleaders, as Michael Phelps did on Wednesday.
